verses.verse: And the YY <WH3068> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>,

Speak <WH1696> <WH8761> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and take <WH3947> <WH8798> of every one of them a rod <WH4294> <WH4294> according to the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>, of all their princes <WH5387> according to the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1> twelve <WH8147> <WH6240> rods <WH4294>: write <WH3789> <WH8799> thou every man's <WH376> name <WH8034> upon his rod <WH4294>.

And thou shalt write <WH3789> <WH8799> Aharon's <WH175> name <WH8034> upon the rod <WH4294> of Levi <WH3878>: for one <WH259> rod <WH4294> shall be for the head <WH7218> of the house <WH1004> of their fathers <WH1>.
And thou shalt lay them up <WH3240> <WH8689> in the tabernacle <WH168> of the congregation <WH4150> before <WH6440> the testimony <WH5715>, where I will meet <WH3259> <WH8735> with you.

And it shall come to pass, that the man's <WH376> rod <WH4294>, whom I shall choose <WH977> <WH8799>, shall blossom <WH6524> <WH8799>: and I will make to cease <WH7918> <WH8689> from me the murmurings <WH8519> of the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, whereby they murmur <WH3885> <WH8688> against you.

And Mosheh <WH4872> spake <WH1696> <WH8762> unto the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>, and every one of their princes <WH5387> gave <WH5414> <WH8799> him a rod <WH4294> <WH4294> apiece, for each prince <WH5387> <WH5387> one <WH259> <WH259>, according to their fathers <WH1> ' houses <WH1004>, even twelve <WH6240> <WH8147> rods <WH4294>: and the rod <WH4294> of Aharon <WH175> was among <WH8432> their rods <WH4294>.
And Mosheh <WH4872> laid up <WH3240> <WH8686> the rods <WH4294> before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> in the tabernacle <WH168> of witness <WH5715>.

And it came to pass, that on the morrow <WH4283> Mosheh <WH4872> went <WH935> <WH8799> into the tabernacle <WH168> of witness <WH5715>; and, behold, the rod <WH4294> of Aharon <WH175> for the house <WH1004> of Levi <WH3878> was budded <WH6524> <WH8804>, and brought forth <WH3318> <WH8686> buds <WH6525>, and bloomed <WH6692> <WH8686> blossoms <WH6731>, and yielded <WH1580> <WH8799> almonds <WH8247>.

And Mosheh <WH4872> brought out <WH3318> <WH8686> all the rods <WH4294> from before <WH6440> the YY <WH3068> unto all the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478>: and they looked <WH7200> <WH8799>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> every man <WH376> his rod <WH4294>.

And the YY <WH3068> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, Bring <WH7725> Aharon's <WH175> rod <WH4294> again <WH7725> <WH8685> before <WH6440> the testimony <WH5715>, to be kept <WH4931> for a token <WH226> against the rebels <WH4805> <WH1121>; and thou shalt quite take away <WH3615> <WH8762> their murmurings <WH8519> from me, that they die <WH4191> <WH8799> not.
And Mosheh <WH4872> did <WH6213> <WH8799> so: as the YY <WH3068> commanded <WH6680> <WH8765> him, so did <WH6213> <WH8804> he.

And the children <WH1121> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto Mosheh <WH4872>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Behold, we die <WH1478> <WH8804>, we perish <WH6> <WH8804>, we all perish <WH6> <WH8804>.
Whosoever cometh any thing near <WH7131> unto the tabernacle <WH4908> of the YY <WH3068> shall die <WH4191> <WH8799>: shall we be consumed <WH8552> <WH8804> with dying <WH1478> <WH8800> ?
